name: MMO Simulator
description:
A mouse only game where you attempt to get from level 1 to max level in an MMO

The game is currently in active development and has only programmer art for now. The aim is to learn how all the game's hidden systems work and exploit them to get to max level. This is a very early version which is available to give you a sense of what the game will be like once more of the grind treadmill is built.

As it's an idle game you can expect at some point unlocking a method of automatically doing some tasks, but keep an eye on your health and inventory.

Contact me if you find anything that seems broken.
